title: He Heard His Name… Then He Ran (Dog Reunion) | Wait for the end
description: A 45-second emotional reunion story. Would you cry? #shorts

scenes.prompt: Night rain, UAE street, wet road reflections, soft neon lights. A small dog alone near a bus stop, shivering. Cinematic, photorealistic, shallow DOF.
scenes.caption:
He was lost.
كان ضايع.

scenes.prompt: Close-up dog face, wet fur, sad eyes, rain droplets, soft bokeh. Photorealistic, cinematic.
scenes.caption:
All night.
طول الليل.

scenes.prompt: Wide shot, people pass by under umbrellas, dog stays still near curb. Rainy city bokeh. Cinematic.
scenes.caption:
No one knew.
ولا أحد عرف.

scenes.prompt: Morning light after rain, quiet street. Dog walks slowly, tired, paws on wet pavement. Cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
He kept searching.
وكان يدور.

scenes.prompt: Close-up: dog nose sniffing the air, ears perk up slightly. Shallow DOF, cinematic.
scenes.caption:
Then…
وبعدين…

scenes.prompt: A man in his 30s holding a leash and an old dog collar, standing near a community notice board, exhausted face. Cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
His owner never stopped looking.
صاحبه ما وقف يدور.

scenes.prompt: Close-up man hands holding a worn collar with a name tag (no readable text). Cinematic.
Dog behind a fence hears a familiar voice from far, head turns fast. Cinematic, shallow DOF.
scenes.caption:
He heard his name.
سمع اسمه.

scenes.prompt: Close-up dog ears up, eyes wide, body trembling from excitement. Cinematic.
scenes.caption:
He froze.
تجمّد.

scenes.prompt: Dog breaks into a run, paws splashing small puddles, motion blur. Cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
Then he ran.
وبعدين ركض.

scenes.prompt: Slow-motion feel: dog running toward camera, wet fur, sunlight, dramatic bokeh. Cinematic.
Owner turns around, shocked eyes, drops the leash slightly, hands open. Cinematic close-up, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
He couldn’t believe it.
ما صدّق.

scenes.prompt: Dog jumps into owner arms, owner kneels and hugs dog tight, tears. Warm sunlight, cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
After days… they met.
بعد أيام… التقوا.

scenes.prompt: Close-up: owner face crying and smiling, dog licking his cheek. Cinematic, shallow DOF.
Owner wraps dog in a towel, gentle hands, dog calm and safe. Cozy warm light, cinematic.
scenes.caption:
Safe again.
رجع أمان.

scenes.prompt: Evening at home, dog eating from a bowl, owner watching quietly, warm lamp light. Cinematic.
scenes.caption:
Home.
بيت.

scenes.prompt: Dog sleeping curled up on couch, owner hand resting nearby, warm light, shallow DOF. Cinematic.
scenes.caption:
Don’t give up.
لا تيأس.

scenes.prompt: Wide peaceful shot: owner and dog walking together at sunset, leash gentle, golden light, calm ending. Cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
Would you cry too?
كنت بتبكي؟
